casebody.data:
BRADFORD v. POSTEL, JUSTICE OF THE SUPREME COURT OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, et al. No. 402,

Misc.

Decided October 10, 1966. Appellant pro se. Louis J. Lefkowitz, Attorney General of New York, Samuel A. Hirshowitz, First Assistant Attorney General, and Brenda Soloff, Assistant Attorney General, for appellees. Per Curiam.

The motion to dismiss is granted and the appeal is dismissed for want of a substantial federal question.
